response.overview: The future is single mums - I don't know if Oates's mum has a husband but I can't hear him so if he's there he's just writing and we're gonna burn the books anyway. Filmmaker and L.A. socialite Oates Wu is actually stuck in China right now - he went over to develop a feature film and then coronavirus virus broke out. 28 days later, with no way out (or into the film industry lol) Organic Cow screens at Garden Reflexxx 3 making you wonder, do they serve steak on Christmas Island? I once saw Mel Gibson eat a steak with one hand.
response.title: Organic Cow
